thread.section_title: Alliance Security Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Alliance Security | alliancesecurity.com
thread.title: Henrietta Hodge
thread.title_full: Alliance Security reviewed by Henrietta Hodge

author: Henrietta Hodge
title: Henrietta Hodge
text: Today I met a personable camera technician who felt my need. At 64 years old, I don't know a great deal about the Internet. I explained what I needed and he proceeded, keeping me in the loop all the way. Thank you, Alliance, for finding such a great professional. He loves his work and that makes the difference.
